DOC.criteria: Males female age 25 60 year . Overweight obese , define BMI 23.0 39.9 kg/m2 . Impaired fast glucose , define fast blood glucose 100 125 mg/dl . Prehypertension Grade 1 hypertension , define systolic blood pressure 120159 mm Hg AND diastolic BP 8099 mm Hg . Ability participant ( investigator 's opinion ) comprehend full nature purpose study include possible risk side effect . Consent study willing comply study procedure . Prescription medication use hypertension , high cholesterol , diabetes , heart disease , cancer , liver disease , AIDS/HIV 2 . Intake food and/or dietary supplement may confound study outcome include use nonibased dietary supplement last month . Regular use ( > 3 time per week past month ) dietary supplement contain `` super fruit '' high antioxidant concentration . Regular use ( > 3 time per week past month ) dietary supplement intend alter regulate blood glucose level .
